website_summaries.verdict: This earth-friendly, plant-based shampoo hydrates and protects curls for delightful definition and bounce.
pros: Chia seed extract helps to reduce frizz and nourish hair
Transforms dry and frizzy hair into hydrated, lush curls
No harmful chemicals, sulfates, or parabens
Great for those with thicker hair
cons: It doesn't form a rich lather, which some people don't like

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy for my curls
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for my hair , I have fine and frizzy hair , and this shampoo leaves my hair too dry, in order to tame the frizz I have to apply tons of styling products which wears my hair down , unfortunately I bought a full size, hope they have another one for dry and frizzy hair like mine
customer_reviews.author: Martha Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair feels extremely healthy and strong with continued use of this shampoo. I wish it smelled a bit better or didn’t have a scent at all as I’ve heard adding fragrances is just a wasted extra chemical. Luckily the scent isn’t very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My hair is so shiny & healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these products after researching the “curly girl method”. The shampoo & conditioner met the criteria. I love that a little bit goes a long way. It smells nice. My hair is so shiny & healthy. My waves/loose curls are much more defined. Highly recommend these products!
customer_reviews.author: Imyursister

customer_reviews.title: Works on my curly hair
customer_reviews.text: My curly hair works with this shampoo, maximize the curl. I use this shampoo with their Biotin Conditioner. Turns out my hair curly and smooth. I recommend you to buy also the conditioner to make the hair texture more smooth. I’ve repurchased pura d’or shampoo and conditioner multiple times and they never disappoint me. The scent also so good smell so natural, I love their hair products.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I do see an improvement since I started using this shampoo and conditioner combo! My curls are a little more defined than they were, and I really like the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Lackluster results for my 2c hair. I have been practicing the curly girl methods for months and this is by far been the most underwhelming product that I have used, too bad as I really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh on my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a natural shampoo that would be gentle on my curly hair, but this one seemed to strip my hair of all it's natural oils and leave it dry and stiff. I could hardly get a brush through it after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell much difference in my natural curls and it smells really bad to me
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Not for me....
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't for me. It left my hair feeling like plastic right after the shower and super super dry.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Frizz head
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, curly, gray hair. This shampoo doesn't lather up well the first time. My hair does not come out shiny but knotted and frizzy. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: EsteeR

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My frizzy dry hair was smooth and sleek after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Moisture stripping!
customer_reviews.text: Awful smell, kinda like alcohol. Made my hair feel stripped of all moisture and definitely did nothing for my curls.
customer_reviews.author: chandra hess

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stand the scent in this shampoo and cannot use it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleaning for fine, curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using PURA D'OR Hair Thinning Therapy Intense Moisturizing Masque for several years, and decided to try the shampoo. I have fine, curly, shoulder-length hair that tends to be dry. Most moisturizing shampoos and conditioners make my hair flat and dirty looking, so I am always on the lookout for one that defines my curls without flattening them. This shampoo leaves my hair moisturized yet still curly and not flat! It's a little more watery than I like, but four pumps into my hand washes and moisturizes my hair without needing any separate conditioner. I've also sent this shampoo and the hair masque to my mother-in-law, who also has fine hair, and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kearns

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine curly hair that tends to be frizzy - after using this shampoo - my curls are awesome! I can't believe how many products I've tried over the years but this is the best. It works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S

customer_reviews.title: Liking the product so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the product for a month now and I am a liking it thus far, I do tend to have greasy hair and this helps it. Only thing is I wished it were a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonnewby

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell outwieghs benefits
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for my hair, but the smell (which I would describe as a sort of medicinal citrus) is so potent and unpleasant. My boyfriend requested we air out the house after I used the shampoo, conditioner, and cream.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppy McShopperson
